title: Seachange = Sea change. Series 1. Ep. 1-7
creator_credit: Artist Services, ABC-TV (Australia), Sally Ayre-Smith, Michael Carson, Ray Argall, Ali Ali and Sue Brooks
brief_description: Corporate lawyer Laura Gibson (Sigrid Thornton), and her two children find themselves moving from the city to the country when Laura’s marriage falls apart, her husband is imprisoned for embezzlement, and Laura misses out on a partnership. Reluctantly, and with dreams of picking up her life of disarray she begins a position as magistrate in the seaside community of Pearl Bay. They discover that the idyllic location harbours secrets which manifests itself in strange machinations. This tape includes the first seven episodes and stars Sigrid Thornton, David Wenham, John Howard, Bruce Alexander, Kate Atkinson, Kerry Armstrong, and Alice Garner. Episodes directed by Michael Carson, Ray Argall, Ali Ali and Sue Brooks.
